position_description: WE ARE AMDARIS We fuse together exceptional talent who deliver outstanding software solutions in our blended model of resources across Europe. We are growing aggressively and we are now looking for a Senior Python Developer to embark on an international project and work with the latest technologies alongside the brightest minds in a collaborative and energetic work environment. We are offering stimulating salaries plus a great range of benefits, including the opportunity of building and enhancing yourself a successful career within a highly reputable organisation. A great team mentality is essential with the ability to lead by example and promote good team spirit and collaboration. ROLE INTRO The main purpose of the role is to develop and support Python projects and functions and complete specific client project work and miscellaneous tasks. This role involves using established work procedures to analyse, design, develop, implement, maintain, re-engineer and troubleshoot customers’ applications. Your primary focus will be the development of all server-side logic, ensuring high performance and responsiveness to requests from the front-end. As a Python Developer , you will be responsible for writing reusable, testable, and efficient code, designing and implementing low-latency, high-availability, and performant applications. You will have to integrate user-facing elements developed by front-end developers with server-side logic and implement security and data protection. The successful Python Developer will have to participate in all phases of the software development lifecycle and support other developers, implementing software enhancements and suggesting improvements to create high-quality products that meet customer needs. REQUIREMENTS  Extensive experience with Python and deep knowledge of at least one Python web framework (Django, Flask, etc.).  Proven experience in cloud technologies, with a focus on Azure and possibly AWS, including the ability to design, deploy, and manage cloud-based solutions.  Optional experience or knowledge in MLOps.  Strong experience with version control tools such as Git.  Proven experience in developing web-based user interfaces and integrating them with server-side logic.  Good understanding of server-side templating and the ability to optimize output for different delivery platforms.  Ability to create database schemas that represent and support business processes  Strong unit test and debugging skills, ensuring high-quality code.  Strong analytical skills and good attention to detail.  A keen interest in the latest technologies and a demonstrable desire to push the boundaries of what is possible.  Strong communication skills in English  BENEFITS  Opportunities for certification and training  Internal referral bonus up to EUR 1.000  English courses  Gym allowance  Medical Reimbursement  Full salary covered up to 20 days of sickness  Flexible working hours  Loyalty scheme  Team building activities, special events and conferences  UK/EU Travel opportunities  Snacks and drinks in the office

You will work with both frontend and backend technologies to create robust and scalable solutions that meet our business needs. Dyninno is a Group of companies providing products and services in the travel, finance, entertainment, and technology sectors in 50+ countries. The company develops and implements innovations and technology in its products. Thanks to that, casting professionals quickly find true talent, travelers get the best ticket prices for flights from over 70+ airlines in a fraction of a second, and clients have access to loan products and financial instruments in just one click from anywhere in the world. We are looking for a talented Senior DevOps Engineer to join our dynamic team. Responsibilities:  Develop, troubleshoot, and improve Infrastructure as Code (IaC).  Integrate and manage GitOps setup (ArgoCD).  Services migration to Kubernetes.  Gitlab-CI pipelines configuration, troubleshooting, and further improvement.  Identify and implement optimal solutions to technical challenges.  Knowledge sharing with less experienced team members.  Requirements:  Strong experience with Kubernetes.  Proven experience with Terraform and CI/CD solutions like GitLab-CI, Jenkins, or GitHub Actions.  Experience in writing complex scripts in bash/python.  A solid understanding of how Linux systems work.  Nice to have, but not a requirement:  Experience in writing advanced Helm charts with test coverage.  Experience in developing simple services and the ability to read the code written by someone else.  Compensation: There is no one-size-fits-all here, we are quite flexible and use an individual approach with every candidate we meet. While getting familiar during our interview, we try to understand where your working experience, professional skills and future contribution to the company can be applied within our multiple business projects. We don’t want to set any limits, but if we are naming the numbers, then the salary for this position is up to $5000 NET per month depending on your experience and skills. With us you will:  Get official employment and social package benefits;  Get engagement with a major IT-park company;  Be a part of a top-tier team, work on projects that reach millions worldwide, and create complex in-house products and solutions;  Learn and exchange ideas in lectures and workshops led by colleagues and team leads;  Have flexible (Hybrid model) working hours and plan your day – it’s all about the teamwork and performance;  Enjoy employee discount programs and have fun at monthly internal activities and celebrations;  Work from a modern and well-equipped office with all facilities and relaxation areas, with parking space, fresh fruits and coffee on a daily basis.

Inther Software Development  26 decembrie 2024  ISD specializes in developing and delivering software solutions to businesses across the globe. Our focus is on ensuring a seamless experience for both our employees and clients, achieved through three key approaches: innovation, product development, and ongoing maintenance. We are excited to expand our team by hiring a Cloud Developer for one of our major projects. Our Dutch client, a global leader in integrating computer vision and robotics into logistics and fulfilment systems, is looking for a skilled Cloud Developer to join their team. In this role, you’ll be working with their Intelligence department, which has extensive experience in the postal and parcel industry. Your responsibilities will include managing sorting center configurations, defining equipment parameters, orchestrating coding workflows, handling OCR (Optical Character Recognition) tasks, and ensuring smooth communication between customer backend systems, both locally and in the cloud. The core of the project is the Smart Sorting Platform, a highly sophisticated system that processes and centralizes sorting tasks. This platform must make accurate sorting decisions in a matter of milliseconds, allowing the client to analyze the data and optimize logistics processes on a national scale. As a Cloud Developer (AWS + TypeScript) , your role will be critical in ensuring that the AWS infrastructure supporting this platform is stable, scalable, and delivers top performance. If you're ready to take on this challenging and rewarding position, we encourage you to apply! What do we expect from you?  Over 2 years of experience as a Cloud Engineer with any cloud provider. Experience with AWS and Serverless technologies is a big plus (Lambda, DynamocDB, EFS, S3, EventBridge, Kinesis, etc.);  Strong programming skills in TypeScript for backend systems or previous experience with JavaScript or Python;  Familiarity and expertise in event-driven architectures;  Experience or eagerness to learn and work with CDK for deployment and infrastructure scripting;  Familiarity with other cloud platforms (Azure, GCP);  Advanced spoken and written English.  What are you going to do?  Design and Develop Serverless Applications: Utilize AWS services like Lambda, DynamoDB, EFS, and S3 to create serverless applications, with a future goal of making the system cloud-agnostic.  Enhance Sorting Processes: Integrate advanced logic into sorting processes to boost efficiency and accuracy.  Build and Test Code: Create unit and integration tests for the new logic you develop to ensure reliability.  Manage CDK Stacks: Develop and update AWS Cloud Development Kit (CDK) stacks to facilitate testing and deployment of platform components.  Implement Best Practices: Ensure that security, performance, and reliability standards are upheld throughout the development cycle.  Resolve API Issues: Quickly identify and fix any API-related problems to maintain smooth operations.  Document and Maintain: Thoroughly document designs, processes, and procedures to support ongoing development and future maintenance.  What is it in for you?  Private health insurance;  Sports compensation for gym memberships or online sports subscriptions;  Flexible schedule;  Education budget for Certifications, Courses, Training and Conferences (a part of the education budget can be spent on gadgets, that stay yours);  Books budget;  5 pm Club – a concept developed by ISD to offer 1-hour every week for self-development, development of your ideas and/or presentations to the team to improve public speaking skills.  If you are interested in this job position, you can send your CV to talent@inthergroup.com .

position_title: Head of Cloud Infrastructure and Security
position_description: Location: Moldova, Bulgaria, Romania, and Central Europe Purcari Wineries Group is a leading wine producer in Central Europe, with operations spanning Moldova, Bulgaria, Romania, and beyond. We are renowned for our commitment to excellence and innovation in the wine industry. As we continue to grow, we seek a dynamic Head of Cloud Infrastructure and Security to join us on our journey to grow our digital and data capabilities. Role Overview: The Head of Cloud Infrastructure and Security will be responsible for managing the design, implementation, and operation of cloud infrastructure while maintaining the remaining on-premise infrastructure across Moldova, Bulgaria and Romania. The role involves ensuring the security, resilience, and scalability of our systems, managing resource provisioning, connectivity, and security automation, while driving cost optimization and ensuring business continuity. Key Responsibilities: Infrastructure Management:  Oversee cloud (AWZ, Azure) and on-premise infrastructure in Moldova, Bulgaria and Romania, ensuring high availability and scalability.  Manage network connectivity, VPNs, firewalls, and related infrastructure to provide reliable & secure access across all operational regions.  Lead the provisioning of on-demand resources, including virtual machines, databases, storage, and container orchestration (Kubernetes or similar).  Implement best practices for resource management and performance optimization across cloud and on-premise environments in multiple countries.  Security:  Develop and enforce security standards, policies, and controls to ensure compliance with regulations across Moldova, Bulgaria, Romania, and Central Europe (e.g., GDPR, ISO 27001).  Oversee access management, ensuring secure and streamlined access to critical systems and data across multiple jurisdictions.  Lead the implementation of security automation to detect, prevent, and respond to security threats.  Conduct regular security assessments and audits across all operational regions, identifying vulnerabilities and remediation measures.  Operations & Reliability:  Establish comprehensive observability and monitoring systems to ensure real-time visibility into infrastructure performance and security across multiple countries.  Develop and lead incident response protocols, ensuring timely resolution of outages and security incidents.  Design and maintain disaster recovery (DR) plans, ensuring continuity of operations across Moldova, Bulgaria, Romania, and other regions.  Lead cost optimization efforts through efficient resource management and cloud services utilization.  Key Skills & Qualifications:  Cloud Infrastructure Expertise: Expert in cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP), including cloud-native services, automation (IaC) and containerization (Docker, Kubernetes).  On-Premise Infrastructure Management: Experience managing physical servers, networking, storage, and security devices across multiple regions.  Security: Expertise in security frameworks, policies, and technologies (firewalls, VPNs, SIEM, IAM). Experience with security automation and compliance in multiple countries (e.g., GDPR).  Operations & Monitoring: Strong knowledge of monitoring tools (e.g., Prometheus, Grafana) and expertise in incident response, troubleshooting, and disaster recovery planning.  Resource Management & Cost Optimization: Proficiency in managing resources and cloud costs across a distributed infrastructure.  Compliance & Governance: Familiarity with regulatory requirements (GDPR, ISO 27001) and the ability to ensure compliance across multiple jurisdictions.  Automation & Scripting: Hands-on experience with automation tools (Ansible, Terraform, CDK) and scripting (Python, Go, Bash) for infrastructure management.  Leadership & Communication: Proven ability to lead teams and collaborate across different regions and cultural settings.  Preferred Experience:  Experience managing hybrid infrastructure (cloud and on-premise) across multiple countries.  Relevant certifications from AWS, Azure etc.  Language: Working language is English. What We Offer:  Competitive salary and benefits package.  The opportunity to build and scale the cloud infrastructure of a renowned wine producer in Central Europe.  A collaborative, innovative working environment.  Professional development and continuous learning opportunities.

position_title: Specialist în Procesarea și Structurarea Datelor
position_description: Global Database  26 decembrie 2024  Locație: Office Companie: Global Database Despre Global Database: Global Database este un lider de încredere în furnizarea de date complete despre companii, obținute direct din registre guvernamentale din peste 100 de țări. Misiunea noastră este să oferim afacerilor date precise, fiabile și acționabile, care să susțină creșterea și inovația. Prin utilizarea tehnologiilor avansate, ajutăm clienții noștri să ia decizii informate și să-și păstreze avantajul competitiv pe piață. Descrierea Rolului: Căutăm un Specialist în Procesarea și Structurarea Datelor care să se alăture echipei noastre în creștere. În acest rol, vei fi responsabil pentru extragerea, procesarea și structurarea datelor dintr-o varietate de surse, asigurându-te că acestea sunt curate, consistente și gata pentru integrare în platforma noastră. Dacă îți place să rezolvi provocări complexe legate de date și ești pasionat de eficiență și precizie, vrem să te cunoaștem! Responsabilități Cheie:  Dezvoltarea și optimizarea scripturilor sau instrumentelor pentru procesarea și structurarea datelor brute din diverse formate (de exemplu, JSON, XML, CSV, HTML, text).  Extragerea și transformarea datelor nestructurate sau semi-structurate în formate utilizabile, menținând un nivel ridicat de acuratețe.  Identificarea, diagnosticarea și rezolvarea problemelor legate de procesarea datelor pentru a asigura integritatea și calitatea acestora.  Colaborarea cu echipe multidisciplinare pentru integrarea datelor procesate în sistemele și platformele noastre.  Îmbunătățirea continuă a proceselor de procesare a datelor pentru creșterea eficienței și scalabilității.  Documentarea detaliată a metodelor, instrumentelor și fluxurilor de lucru utilizate.  Cerințe:  Experiență dovedită în procesarea, analizarea sau prelucrarea datelor.  Competență ridicată în limbaje de programare utilizate pentru procesarea datelor, cum ar fi Python, Java sau echivalente.  Cunoștințe avansate despre expresii regulate, tehnici de scraping web și utilizarea API-urilor.  Familiaritate cu diferite formate de date, inclusiv JSON, XML, CSV și HTML.  Experiență în utilizarea bazelor de date relaționale și non-relaționale (SQL, NoSQL).  Abilități analitice și de rezolvare a problemelor, cu mare atenție la detalii.  Capacitatea de a lucra atât independent, cât și în colaborare într-un mediu dinamic. Cunoștințe despre procesele de îmbogățire și curățare a datelor.  Înțelegerea reglementărilor legate de conformitatea și confidențialitatea datelor. position_title: Full stack web разработчик (django rest framework и react js)
position_description: Deeplace  №14246985, 4 noiembrie 2024  Мы ищем опытного веб-разработчика в нашу команду! Как веб-разработчик, вы будете нести ответственность за разработку и внедрение программных решений. Наши проекты дадут вам больше разнообразия и никогда не дадут вам скучать.  Чем предстоит заниматься: - работать над развитием и поддержкой информационных систем для наших клиентов; - в составе сплочённой команды разрабатывать комплексные веб-системы различного назначения; - искать эффективные методы решения нестандартных задач; - заниматься сопровождением уже разработанных систем, включая анализ их архитектуры и работу с чужим кодом; - дорабатывать автоматизации CI/CD в GitLab и обеспечивать обзор кода коллег.  Что требуется от кандидата: - Опыт разработки с Django Python web framework; - Разрабытывать REST службы описанные по OpenAPI спецификации; - Разработка на React.JS - Понимание ООП и опыт его использования; - Знание СУБД (в частности MySQL/MariaDB, но пригодится опыт в PostgreSQL, Oracle, SQLite); - Способность как к командной, так и к самостоятельной результативной работе; - Способность быстро осваивать новые технологии; - Навыки решения проблем и аналитические способности; - Желание писать код, за который не стыдно перед коллегами; - Опыт в сфере разработки. - Следование подходу «Secure by design» на всех этапах разработки. - Опыт работы с Docker и контейнеризацией. - Знание Git и инструментов управления версиями кода. - Базовые знания интернет-протоколов и механизмов IPC. - Высшее образование в области компьютерных наук, информационных технологий или аналогичной сфере. - Разумная педантичность и аккуратность в решении задач - Владение русским, румынским, и английским письменным языками;  Что будет плюсом: - Знание других языков программирования и framework: PHP (Drupal, Symfony, Laravel, Wordpress), Node.js, Flask; - Знание фреймворков для разработки гибридных мобильных приложений (например, React Native, Flutter); - Знание eCommerce платформ; - NoSQL БД — MongoDB, Redis, Elasticsearch; - Знать слова XAdES, PKI, X509, SOAP, nginx/Apache HTTPD, Solr, Load balancing, Node.js, AMQP/RabbitMQ — мы все это используем; - Linux и shell scripting; - Знание веб протоколов, механизмов IPC; - Опыт работы с системами отслеживания ошибок и системами управления версиями; - Совпадение оценки работ с их реализацией во времени; - Верстка адаптивных веб приложений (RWD); - Unit тестирование и BDD; - Внутренее желание автоматизировать всё и всех; - Сертификации по технологиям из предложенного стека; - Понимание проблематики нагруженных систем обрабатывающие большие объемы данных; - Опыт интеграции со сторонними службами: платёжными шлюзами, CRM системами, веб службами eGov;  Что мы предлагаем: - привлекательная заработная плата в зависимости от стажа; - комфортный и современный офис в центре города; - полный социальный пакет; - комфортный график работы: 9:00 - 18:00 (понедельник - пятница); - ценные знания и отличный опыт для дальнейшего развития; - возможности для саморазвития (обучение, коучинг, конференции); - тимбилдинг и корпоративные мероприятия, которые разбавят монотонность работы. WDIA  №14802000, 5 noiembrie 2024  ABOUT US  At we do IT Agile, we specialise in delivering bespoke IT solutions across the United Kingdom, BeNeLux, and DACH regions. We’re expanding our network of talented backend developers to work on a variety of projects that span industries and push the boundaries of backend brilliance. Our team values continuous learning, autonomy, collaboration, honesty, and openness, making this a great place for developers who thrive in a supportive, flexible environment.  READ THIS – IT’S IMPORTANT!  We’re not looking for unicorns who can do it all. We need experts in their domains—whether that’s Java, GoLang, PHP, or something else entirely. This is a fully remote opportunity, so you can work from wherever suits you best (home office, café, or somewhere exotic). If needed, we’ll even fly you to the client site in Europe once a month (all on us) to meet the team and get hands-on with the project. Most of our projects are fully remote, but some clients prefer monthly team sessions.  REQUIREMENTS  -  Communication Skills: Top-notch English skills for writing, reading, and speaking, with a quick response time for interviews (usually within 1-2 days). German language skills are a very strong advantage. - Experience: A minimum of 5 years in backend development – we’re after depth, not just dabbling. - Location Flexibility: Work from anywhere in the world (as long as it has decent Wi-Fi). - Travel Readiness: Willing to travel to the client site in Europe if needed (travel’s fully covered by us). - Schedule Flexibility: Available for both part-time and full-time work, depending on client needs. - Availability: Able to start within 15 days, with a maximum notice period of 2 weeks. - Certifications: Certifications like AWS, Docker, or backend technology credentials are a plus but not required. They’re like extra brownie points!  PREFERRED SKILLS  We’re looking for a range of skills, but you don’t need to know it all. Instead, we’re seeking experts who bring deep knowledge in their area of specialisation. Here are a few examples of what could make you a great fit.  - Programming Languages : Java, Python, JavaScript (Node.js), C#, PHP, Ruby, Go (Golang), Rust, Kotlin, Swift. - Frameworks: Spring Boot, Django, Flask, Express.js, .NET Core, Ruby on Rails, ASP.NET, Laravel, Koa, Phoenix. - Databases: MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, Oracle, SQL Server, DynamoDB, Cassandra, ElasticSearch. - Cloud & DevOps Tools: AWS (Lambda, S3, RDS), Google Cloud Platform, Microsoft Azure, Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, Ansible, Terraform, CloudFormation. - Testing Tools: JUnit, Mocha, Jest, Postman, REST Assured, PyTest. CI/CD Tools: GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, CircleCI, Travis CI, Bamboo.  WHAT WE OFFER  - Global Opportunity: Work from any location, on projects that span industries and regions. - Flexibility: Both part-time and full-time options, tailored to your availability. - Sponsored Travel: Monthly visits to the client site in Europe, if needed, with all travel costs covered. - Fast Process: Quick interview setup – usually within 1-2 days.  WE ARE LOOKING FORWARD!  If you’re an expert in your domain, fluent in English (and possibly German!), and ready to bring your backend skills to exciting new projects, apply today to join we do IT Agile, where we value your expertise, sense of humour, and, yes, your certifications.

Netbeau  №14813293, 7 noiembrie 2024  Despre companie:  Compania Netbeau -fondată în 2008 cu o experienta de peste 10 ani și cu sute de proiecte la activ în diferite domenii de activitate cauta să-și extindă echipa pentru viitoarele proiecte (sunt proiecte atît pe plan extern cît și international: Norvegia, Germania, UK, Franța, România, Rusia si Canada).  Join Our Team as a QA Automation Engineer! We’re seeking a detail-oriented QA Automation Engineer to help build and maintain automated testing frameworks that ensure the quality and reliability of our platform. If you’re passionate about test automation and have a knack for finding ways to improve product quality through effective test strategies, we’d love to meet you!  Key Responsibilities: - Design, develop, and maintain automated test scripts for web and mobile applications, ensuring comprehensive test coverage. - Collaborate closely with developers, product managers, and other QA team members to define and implement testing strategies. - Perform integration, regression, and performance testing using automation tools to identify issues early in the development lifecycle. - Work with CI/CD pipelines to integrate automated tests, providing fast and reliable feedback on code changes. - Create and maintain testing documentation, such as test plans, test cases, and test scripts. What You Bring: - 3+ years of experience in test automation with a strong knowledge of frameworks like Selenium, Cypress, Appium, or similar tools. - Proficiency in a programming language (e.g., Python, Java, or JavaScript) to write and maintain test scripts. - Experience in API testing and using tools like Postman or REST Assured to automate backend testing. - Familiarity with CI/CD tools (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab, CircleCI) and version control systems like Git. - Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with attention to detail and commitment to delivering high-quality work.  Why Join Us? position_description: Synergy Academy  №14790792, 28 noiembrie 2024  Преподаватель программирования для детей  Компания "Synergy Academy" — образовательная академия для детей 5–18 лет, специализирующаяся на развитии навыков в области STEM, маркетинга и творческих дисциплин. Требования к кандидатам: - Интерес к работе с детьми и доброжелательность. - Коммуникабельность, умение поддерживать дисциплину в группе. - Знание хотя бы одного из следующих направлений: программирование, электроника, дизайн, маркетинг. - Навыки работы с ПК - Знание одного или нескольких языков программирования (Python, Java и др.) – будет преимуществом. - Способность объяснять сложные вещи простыми словами - Ответственность  Мы предлагаем: - Обучение преподавателя - Прозрачную и достойную оплату труда (оклад за фиксированное количество часов занятий + бонусы). - Гибкий график работы, который можно согласовать. - Работать Команде молодых и амбициозных людей, увлеченных своим делом. - Полную поддержку и возможности для дальнейшего профессионального роста и развития. - Возможность карьерного роста - Участие в новых проектах  Если вы чувствуете в себе силы вдохновить детей и помочь им реализовать свой потенциал, поддержать их творческий интерес и поделиться своими знаниями, ждем ваш отклик! position_title: Analist Date în Prevenirea Spălării Banilor
position_description: Suntem în căutarea unui Analist Date în Prevenirea Spălării Banilor dedicat și talentat pentru a se alătura echipei noastre. În acest rol vei avea următoarele competențe și abilități care te fac potrivit/potrivită pentru această funcție:  Competențe tehnice:   Experiență extinsă în manipularea și analiza datelor, inclusiv în baze de date SQL și instrumente analitice;  Cunoașterea avansată a limbajelor de programare relevant pentru analiza datelor, precum SQL, Python etc.  Competențe solide în analiza și interpretarea rezultatelor din alertele sistemelor de detecție a acțiunilor posibile de spălare de bani și finanțare de terorism sau eludare a masurilor restrictive internaționale.  Abilități avansate în dezvoltarea și implementarea algoritmilor pentru detectarea acțiunilor posibile de spălare de bani și finanțare de terorism sau eludare a masurilor restrictive internaționale.  Experiență în gestionarea și optimizarea bazelor de date pentru eficiența proceselor de analiză.   Competențe analitice:   Abilități avansate în analiza scenariilor aferent activităților/tranzacțiilor neordinare ale clientului din perspectiva prevenirii spălării banilor și finanțării terorismului și identificarea modelelor complexe;  Experiență în dezvoltarea și implementarea modelelor predictive pentru detectarea activităților/tranzacțiilor neordinare ale clientului din perspectiva prevenirii spălării banilor și finanțării terorismului.  Capacitatea de a interpreta datele provenite din diferite surse și de a oferi insights relevante, precum și reorganizarea/reprezentarea acestora în formatul necesar (diagrame, scheme, tabele etc.).  Abilități de comunicare eficientă a rezultatelor analizelor efectuate;  Participarea la procesul de implementare și testare a aplicațiilor software specifice domeniului Grupului Prevenirea Spălării Banilor, în conformitate cu obligațiunile funcționale;  Participarea la implementarea soluțiilor IT și analitice: colectarea și analiza cerințelor existente, definirea cerințelor noi, testarea și implementarea acestora;   În echipa maib vei beneficia de:   Mediu de muncă profesionist, inovator, creator de tendințe în banking și nu doar, dar și oameni care te vor inspira în ritmul agile;  Oficiu modern și amplasat ultracentral, cafea, zone de relaxare, sală de sport, bucătărie, terasă, etc;  Tichete de masă;  Credite imobiliare și alte servicii bancare în condiții preferențiale;  Asigurare medicală privată sau abonament la sala de sport;  Flexibilitate de a lucra hibrid;  Oportunități de dezvoltare profesională și personală, teambuildinguri;  Gamă largă de reduceri la partenerii maib.   Expediază CV-ul la adresa resurseumane@maib.md , indicând funcția pentru care candidezi și hai să excelăm profesional împreună.  *Vor fi invitate la interviu doar persoanele selectate. În funcție de caz, CV-ul tău ar putea fi analizat și pentru alte poziții vacante din cadrul maib.  Îți mulțumim pentru interes! Ne vom bucura să ne cunoaștem și să facem echipă comună în cadrul maib!

About Us: Route One Group represents a conglomerate of companies dedicated to revolutionizing the trucking industry. With over 8 years of experience in the American market and a strong presence in Chisinau, we provide a comprehensive range of services, including IT solutions, mobile applications, cutting-edge navigation systems, dispatching, logistics, freight, and vehicle transportation. Our commitment to innovation and adaptability positions us as a leader in connecting every aspect of the trucking industry. We're looking for a Lead data analyst to join our team in Chisinau. Job Summary: To deliver data-driven insights that empower the Accounting Director to make informed strategic financial decisions, optimizing financial performance and supporting key business objectives. What we offer:   Friendly and supportive environment  Progressive leadership  Comfortable and fully equipped office  Great working conditions  Official employment and full social package according to Moldova legislation  Working hours Monday-Friday from 16:00 till 01:00 (Moldova Time Zone)   Job requirements:   Establish and lead the data analysis department, including setting up data processes and systems.  Collect and consolidate data from various sources within each of the eight business units.  Develop and maintain databases and data systems to ensure data integrity and accessibility.  Analyze complex data sets to identify trends, patterns, and insights that can drive business strategies.  Create detailed reports and dashboards to visualize data and present findings to stakeholders.  Collaborate with management teams to identify key performance indicators (KPIs) and metrics relevant to each company.  Monitor and evaluate the effectiveness of implemented solutions and adjust strategies as needed.   Required competencies:   Bachelor's degree in Data Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Economics, Computer Science, or a related field.  Minimum of 3 years of experience as a Data Analyst or in a similar role (experience in working with diverse industries and understanding their unique data needs is a plus).  Proven experience in setting up data processes and systems.  Proficiency in data analysis tools and software (e.g., Excel, SQL, Python, R, Tableau, Power BI).  Strong analytical skills with the ability to collect, organize, analyze, and disseminate significant amounts of information with attention to detail and accuracy.  Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to explain complex data findings to non-technical stakeholders.  Experience with data visualization techniques and tools.  High organizational skills with the ability to manage multiple tasks and projects independently.   To learn more about us, please follow: https://routeonegroup.com .  To join our team, e-mail your CV to  careers@routeonegroup.com , or contact us at: 060991111.  Only selected candidates will be contacted for the interview.

A UK-based digital marketing group is hiring in Moldova. We are a global organization of 600 with 50+ people located in Moldova - looking to strengthen our local presence by bringing aboard more talented and ambitious individuals. For this particular role, we are looking for a highly skilled and experienced Linux System Administrator or DevOps Engineer to manage, optimize, and maintain our web servers and application infrastructure. The ideal candidate will have expertise in server configuration, monitoring, automation, and troubleshooting, as well as strong knowledge of PHP, Laravel, Docker, and modern development practices. You'd be working as part of a strong team, in out of our centrally-located renovated office in Chisinau, with full working conditions such as workspace, free lunch and snacks and in an overall positive and helpful environment. Responsibilities: 1. Server Management: - Configure, manage and optimize web servers using **NGINX** and **PHP**. - Ensure high availability, performance, and scalability of web applications. - Troubleshoot server-related issues and perform root cause analysis. 2. Automation & Monitoring: - Automate routine server tasks using **Ansible**, **Bash**, **Python**, or other tools. - Set up and manage uptime and performance monitoring tools like **Prometheus**, **Grafana**, **Zabbix**, or **Pingdom**. - Implement logging and alerting systems using tools like **ELK Stack** or **Graylog**. 3. Application Management: - Deploy, maintain, and optimize applications developed with **Laravel**, **PHP**, and **JavaScript**. - Work with **Docker** containers to streamline development and deployment. - Set up CI/CD pipelines using **Git**, **Bitbucket Pipelines**, or similar tools. 4. Database Administration: - Manage and optimize **MySQL**, **PostgreSQL**, or other relational databases. - Ensure database backups, high availability, and performance tuning. - Collaborate with developers to troubleshoot and resolve application issues. - Provide server-related guidance and mentorship to the development team. Technical Skills: 1. Server Management: - Expertise with **Linux (Ubuntu, CentOS, etc.)** system administration. - Advanced knowledge of **NGINX** and **PHP-FPM** configuration and optimization.2. 2. Automation & Monitoring: - Proficiency in scripting languages like **Bash**, **Python**, or similar. - Experience with tools like **Ansible**, **Terraform**, or **Chef**. - Hands-on experience with monitoring tools such as **Prometheus**, **Grafana**, or **New Relic**. 2. Development Support: - Experience with **Laravel**, **PHP**, and **JavaScript (Datatables, Vue, etc.)**. - Knowledge of **Docker** containerization and orchestration tools like **Kubernetes** (bonus). - Familiarity with **Git** and version control workflows.4. **Database Management:** - Strong skills in **MySQL**, **PostgreSQL**, or similar databases. - Ability to optimize and troubleshoot database performance. **Security & Optimization:** - Proficient in implementing secure server configurations. - Knowledge of SSL/TLS, firewalls, and vulnerability management. Preferred Qualifications (Optional): - Experience with **Kubernetes** or container orchestration tools. - Familiarity with **AWS**, **Google Cloud**, or **Azure** for cloud-based deployments. - Knowledge of **Redis**, **Memcached**, or other caching mechanisms. - Experience with backup and disaster recovery planning. Perks include:   learn from the best (really!)  very competitive salary  opportunity to travel to relevant conferences  company-wide performance bonuses  work with a very experienced team towards achieving globally-recognized success  This is a great opportunity to join a funded & fast-growing startup run by experienced entrepreneurs.  Email us your CV and a few words describing your current status (freelancing, full time employment etc.) the e-mail: team-md@identi.com . Our aim is to get back to all candidates within 1 week.

Для нашего проекта мы ищем преподавателей программирования для детей , готовых полностью посвятить себя развитию наших учеников и с энтузиазмом делиться своими знаниями и энергией. Ищем людей, открытых ко всему новому, нацеленных на качественное образование и создание вдохновляющей среды для детей. В 2017 году мы основали стартап в Молдове - детскую IT академию, где обучаются дети от 5 до 17 лет. Основные обязанности  Проведение занятий по программированию с учетом уровня учеников.  Контроль успеваемости и регулярное предоставление отчетов об обучении.  Общение с родителями и предоставление обратной связи.  Поддержание мотивации учеников и создание комфортной образовательной среды.  Требования к кандидату Владение одним или несколькими из следующих инструментов:  Программирование игр: Scratch, ScratchJR, Blockly, Unity3D + C#, Java, Python (для программирования в Minecraft).  Мобильные приложения: App Inventor, Phone Gap, Xamarin, Android Studio, Xcode, Thunkable.  Языки программирования: C/C++, Java или Objective-C, Python, PHP, JavaScript.  Робототехника: Little Bits, Makey Makey, Arduino и другие.  Web-разработка: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Tilda, Wix, WordPress.  Видеоблоггинг и мультипликация: Adobe Animate, Adobe Premiere.  Графические редакторы: Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Sketch.  Методике преподавания обучим — главное, чтобы вы были готовы учиться и расти вместе с нами. Идеальный кандидат:  Энергичный и мотивированный профессионал, неравнодушный к детскому образованию.  Умеет выступать перед аудиторией, уверенно общается с детьми.  Любит компьютерные игры и понимает их значение для обучения.  Обладает хорошими навыками работы в команде.  Следит за трендами в IT и GameDev.  Готов работать на полной занятости, вкладывая свои силы в развитие учеников.  Условия работы:  Полный рабочий день с гибким графиком, включающим часть часов в будние и часть — в выходные дни.  Современный и комфортный офис для полноценной работы с учениками.  Конкурентоспособная зарплата, которая зависит от уровня нагрузки и результатов.  Работа в дружной команде молодых и амбициозных профессионалов, которые любят своё дело.  Тема письма "Full-time преподаватель по программированию" на training.manager@impactacademies.com . Вышлите ваше CV c 2-3 предложениями о себе и почему хотите к нам.

You’ll work with the latest technologies in our bright, talented team. The environment at Amdaris is synergistic and supportive, so everyone can build the career they want in an organization going from strength to strength. They will be focused on architecting, building, managing and optimizing data pipelines/models and then moving these pipelines/models effectively into production for key data and analytics consumers (including but not limited to MI Analysts and Data Scientists). They will be required to work collaboratively with internal and external stakeholders to identify the optimal ways in which requirements can be achieved. JOB RESPONSIBILITIES  Develop and maintain data models and schema designs that support our business needs.  Applies standard data modelling and design techniques based upon a detailed understanding of requirements.  Collaborate with stakeholders to understand business objectives and translate them into technical solutions.  Work with product teams to ensure that data pipelines meet their needs.  Monitor the performance of data pipelines and resolve issues as they arise.  Ensure that data is accurate, reliable, and available.  Develop and maintain documentation for data infrastructure and pipelines.  JOB REQUIREMENTS  Strong experience with ETL/ELT, data modeling, and data integration  Deep understanding of SQL  Experience with business intelligence tools (Tableau, Power BI, etc.)  Databricks or other managed data analytics platform  Strong AWS cloud service. Familiar with AWS Glue and AWS Redshift or AWS Aurora  Experience to build a data warehouse on AWS  Nice to have experience with Snowflake  Data modeling, data ingestion, data orchestration  Good knowledge of software development practices such as versioning, CI/CD  Knowledge of programming languages (Python)  Strong communication and collaboration skills in English
